üî¨ MEMGPT LITERATURE REVIEW ‚Äî Created docs/research/memgpt-analysis.md. Deep analysis of MemGPT paper (Packer et al., 2023). Key insight: Generative Agents shows WHAT to store (importance + reflection), MemGPT shows HOW to manage (tiered storage, agent-controlled paging, self-modification). Synthesized both into unified architecture: core/recall/archival memory tiers with agent-controlled retrieval and self-modification. Posted update on Issue #95. Phase 1 research 2/2 complete.

üåå COGNITIVE MEMORY ARCHITECTURE SPEC ‚Äî Created docs/design/cognitive-memory-architecture.md. Comprehensive architecture synthesizing Generative Agents + MemGPT. Three-tier model: Core Memory (always in context, writable), Recall Memory (JSONL stream, searchable), Archival Memory (vector-indexed). Memory functions: recall_search(), archival_search(), core_memory_update(). 5-phase implementation roadmap (Sprint 2-4). 4 ADRs. Posted update on Issue #95. Research ‚Üí Architecture COMPLETE ‚úÖ.
